amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Rural Community Advancement Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds (by offset) by $1 million for agricultural tourism.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Sanders.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
